campaign_intent: Raise awareness for SKIMS' international expansion in Fall 2025.

ideas.title: Inclusive Size Challenge on TikTok
ideas.concept: Create a challenge inviting users to showcase how SKIMS' products cater to all sizes. Participants can demonstrate their unique style by remixing photos or videos in SKIMS attire, emphasizing comfort and inclusivity.
ideas.execution_notes: Launch TikTok challenge; promote via influencers; encourage user-generated content; measure engagement through views and shares.

ideas.title: Size Comparison Tool on Website
ideas.concept: Develop an interactive tool to help customers find their ideal size in SKIMS products by comparing them to items they already own, enhancing the shopping experience.
ideas.execution_notes: Integrate size comparison feature on the website; test user experience; monitor conversions via analytics.

ideas.title: Comfort Quiz on Instagram
ideas.concept: Launch an Instagram Stories quiz that prompts users about their comfort preferences, leading them to SKIMS products tailored to their needs.
ideas.execution_notes: Create interactive quiz in Stories; link quiz results to product pages; track Instagram interactions.

ideas.title: Body Positivity Ambassador Campaign
ideas.concept: Partner with micro-influencers in the body positivity space. They can create content around their SKIMS experience, showcasing how the brand fits into their lifestyle and promotes inclusivity.
ideas.execution_notes: Engage 10-15 micro-influencers; provide product for unboxing; ask for 2 posts and 3 stories each; ensure FTC disclosures.

ideas.title: Fashion Forward with SKIMS: Seasonal Drops
ideas.concept: Collaborate with fashion influencers to showcase seasonal SKIMS collections in styling videos or posts, highlighting versatility and comfort.
ideas.execution_notes: Coordinate with 5 mid-tier influencers; plan for 1x IGTV per influencer; use unique promo codes; include disclosures.

ideas.title: Celebrity Co-Create Day
ideas.concept: Host a virtual event with a celebrity and influencers discussing the body positivity journey while showcasing SKIMS products. Their social channels can help amplify the event.
ideas.execution_notes: Schedule live Q&A; prepare interactive polls; use clips for social media; promote extensively before the event.

ideas.title: SKIMS Body Positivity Fashion Show
ideas.concept: Organize a fashion show highlighting diverse body types wearing SKIMS, streamed live on social media to draw international interest.
ideas.execution_notes: Secure venue; invite diverse models; promote via social prior; create highlights for post-show sharing.

ideas.title: Pop-Up Experience in Major Cities
ideas.concept: Set up SKIMS pop-up shops in key cities, providing an interactive experience where customers can try products, attend workshops, and participate in discussions on body positivity.
ideas.execution_notes: Plan logistics for 3 major cities; recruit brand ambassadors; promote through local influencers; gather customer feedback.

ideas.title: SKIMS Fitness and Fashion Day
ideas.concept: Collaborate with fitness studios to create a day focused on comfort in activewear. Participants can try SKIMS products during workouts to experience their comfort firsthand.
ideas.execution_notes: Partner with 3 fitness studios; schedule classes and register attendees; document event via social media.

ideas.title: International Influencer Partnerships with Local Celebrities
ideas.concept: Team up with local celebrities in target international markets to create exclusive collections or limited-edition drops, enhancing cultural relevance.
ideas.execution_notes: Identify local stars; develop co-branded promotions; leverage their networks for visibility.

ideas.title: Collaborate with Global Retailers
ideas.concept: Partner with global retail chains (e.g., ASOS, Zalando) to feature SKIMS in their stores and online, maximizing reach to the international market.
ideas.execution_notes: Create co-branded campaigns; provide training for retail staff on SKIMS products; track sales through retailer channels.

ideas.title: Nonprofit Collaboration for Body Positivity
ideas.concept: Collaborate with nonprofits focused on body positivity to support campaigns with shared messages, like workshops or community events.
ideas.execution_notes: Select partner nonprofits; co-create promotional materials; plan cross-promotions on social channels.

ideas.title: International Launch Event
ideas.concept: Host a global virtual event introducing SKIMS' new international collections, featuring influencers and press coverage. Highlight stories of inclusivity in the fashion industry.
ideas.execution_notes: Send out press releases; invite global media; prepare product samples for reviewers.

ideas.title: Body Positivity Data Insights Release
ideas.concept: Compile and release data on body positivity trends, emphasizing SKIMS' commitment to inclusivity, and pitch to fashion outlets.
ideas.execution_notes: Develop infographics for media; create a press kit; target fashion and lifestyle journalists.

ideas.title: Celebrity Testimonials Campaign
ideas.concept: Gather testimonials from celebrities discussing their personal experiences related to body positivity and how SKIMS products help them.
ideas.execution_notes: Record video testimonials; edit into short clips for social media; distribute through traditional media channels.

ideas.title: Monthly Body Positivity Forum
ideas.concept: Establish an ongoing forum where customers can share experiences with body positivity, comfort, and SKIMS, fostering community engagement and support.
ideas.execution_notes: Set up forum platform; moderate discussions; encourage user interaction and sharing of testimonials.

ideas.title: SKIMS Style Exchanges
ideas.concept: Create a virtual marketplace where customers can trade SKIMS products, promoting sustainability and community, while fostering brand loyalty.
ideas.execution_notes: Build web platform; roll out with clear guidelines; engage customers via email newsletters.

ideas.title: Influencer-Led Body Positivity Workshops
ideas.concept: Host regular workshops led by popular influencers focusing on body positivity and self-love, incorporating SKIMS products into discussions.
ideas.execution_notes: Schedule monthly workshops; invite guest speakers; promote via social channels for visibility.
